attributes.action: Assist 35 Chevening students in Afghanistan regardless of unfinished paperwork.
attributes.additional_details: Reports of the Government procrastinating to facilitate the Chevening students because of unfinished paperwork. These students have worked hard to achieve this scholarship and should be accredited to a future Afghanistan and Great Britain.
attributes.background: To skip the rigid paperwork associated with the 35 Chevening students in Afghanistan and to facilitate them to come to get Great Britain.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Ensure Afghans with Chevening scholarships can start their courses this year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594938
